Effect: Grants protection against environmental damage, such as from heat or cold.Lv. 1:Negates the effects of heat and cold.Lv. 2:Negates environmental damage.

Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks.Lv. 1:Attack +10 while active.Lv. 2:Attack +15 while active.Lv. 3:Attack +20 while active.Lv. 4:Attack +25 while active.Lv. 5:Attack +30 while active.

Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.Lv. 1:Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active.Lv. 2:Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active.Lv. 3:Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active.Lv. 4:Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active.Lv. 5:Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active.
Temporarily increases the damage to large monsters with a successful Sneak Attack.Lv. 1:Attack +5% while active.Lv. 2:Attack +10% while active.Lv. 3:Attack +15% while active.

Once infected, makes it easier to overcome the Frenzy and increases affinity if cured.Lv. 1:Slightly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +3% if cured.Lv. 2:Increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +6% if cured.Lv. 3:Greatly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +10% if cured.

Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.Lv. 1:Negates the effects of muddy streams, and prevents you from being slowed down in water or oilsilt.Lv. 2:Also negates the effects of waves.

Grants protection against webbed status and frostblight.Lv. 1:Allows you to quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.Lv. 2:Allows you to very quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.Lv. 3:Prevents webbed status and frostblight.
Grants protection against blastblight.Lv. 1:Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.Lv. 2:Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.Lv. 3:Prevents blastblight.
Grants protection against bleeding.Lv. 1:Reduces damage while bleeding.Lv. 2:Greatly reduces damage while bleeding.Lv. 3:Prevents bleeding.

Grants protection against all elemental blights.Lv. 1:Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.Lv. 2:Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%Lv. 3:Nullifies all elemental blights.
Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.Lv. 1:Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
Increases the damage of explosive items.Lv. 1:Explosive power +10%Lv. 2:Explosive power +20%Lv. 3:Explosive power +30%

Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gatherLv. 1:One extra consumbale herb item per gather.Lv. 2:Additionally adds one extra consumable fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.Lv. 3:Additionally adds one extra consumable insect item per gather.Lv. 4:Additionally adds one extra consumable mushroom item per gather.

Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (Amount increased depends on weapon.)Lv. 1:On first hit, gain a small temporary attack and element boost, replaced by a larger boost after the fifth hit.Lv. 2:Hit 5 successive times for a moderate stat boost.Lv. 3:Hit 5 successive times for a bigger stat boost.Lv. 4:Hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost.Lv. 5:Hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.
Decrease stamina depletion when climbing on vines.Lv. 1:Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

Temporarily increases elemental attack power and status effects after recovering from blights or abnormal status.Lv. 1:When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup.Lv. 2:When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup.Lv. 3:When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup.

Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.Lv. 1:Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.Lv. 2:Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.Lv. 3:Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.Lv. 4:Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.Lv. 5:Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you dragon element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends.)Lv. 1:While active, deals extra dragon damage after dealing enough elemental damage. Slightly increases dragon attack.Lv. 2:Increases additional dragon damage and increases dragon attack.Lv. 3:Further increases additional dragon damage and greatly increases dragon attack.

Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.Lv. 1:Attack +10 while active.Lv. 2:Attack +15 while active. Moderately extends effect time.Lv. 3:Attack +25 while active. Extends effect time.

Increases defense. Also improves resistances at higher levels.Lv. 1:Defense +5Lv. 2:Defense +10Lv. 3:Defense +5%Bonus: +10Lv. 4:Defense +5%Bonus: +20All elemental resistances +3Lv. 5:Defense +8%Bonus: +20All elemental resistances +3

Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.Lv. 1:While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.Lv. 2:While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.Lv. 3:While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.
Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.Lv. 1:Dragon resistance +6Lv. 2:Dragon resistance +12Lv. 3:Dragon resistance +20, Defense +10

Grants protection from large monsters' roars.Lv. 1:Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.Lv. 2:Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.Lv. 3:Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends)Lv. 1:While active, slightly increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 4.Lv. 2:While active, moderately increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 6.Lv. 3:While active, increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 8.
The bodies of small insect monsters won't be destroyed, allowing them to be carved.Lv. 1:Activates the skill effect.
Increases evade distance.Lv. 1:Slightly extends evasion distance.Lv. 2:Extends evasion distance.Lv. 3:Greatly extends evasion distance.

Extends the invulnerability period when evading.Lv. 1:Very slightly increases invulnerability window.Lv. 2:Slightly increases invulnerability window.Lv. 3:Increases invulnerability window.Lv. 4:Greatly increases invulnerability window.Lv. 5:Massively increases invulnerability window.
Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.Lv. 1:Fire resistance +6Lv. 2:Fire resistance +12Lv. 3:Fire resistance +20, Defense +10

Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Upon inflicting enough damage, also deals additional non-elemental damage,Lv. 1:Makes it ever so slightly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals additional non-elemental damage.Lv. 2:Makes it moderately easier to inflict wounds. Also deals slightly more additional non-elemental damage.Lv. 3:Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Also deals moderately more additional non-elemental damage.Lv. 4:Makes it much easier to inflict wounds. Also deals more additional non-elemental damage.Lv. 5:Makes it significantly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals much more additional non-elemental damage.
Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.Lv. 1:Prevents knockbacks.Lv. 2:Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.Lv. 3:Prevents knockbacks and tripping.

Increases attack power and affinity against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.Lv. 1:Attack +6 against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.Lv. 2:Attack +8 and affinity +5% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.Lv. 3:Attack +10 and affinity +10% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.Lv. 4:Attack +12 and affinity +15% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.Lv. 5:Attack +15 and affinity +20% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.Lv. 1:Activates 10% of the time.Lv. 2:Activates 25% of the time.Lv. 3:Activates 45% of the time.

Increases the number of times you gain at gathering points.Lv. 1:One extra item when gathering from bonepiles.Lv. 2:Additionally adds one extra item when gathering special items.Lv. 3:Additionally adds one extra item when gathering from mining outcrops.

Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.Lv. 1:Defense +50 while active.Lv. 2:Attack +5% and defense +50 while active.Lv. 3:Attack +5% and defense +100 while active.Lv. 4:Attack +10% and defense +100 while active.Lv. 5:Attack +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated while active.

Reduces maximum stamina depetion over time.Lv. 1:Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.Lv. 2:Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.Lv. 3:Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.
Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.Lv. 1:Ice resistance +6.Lv. 2:Ice resistance +12.Lv. 3:Ice resistance +20. Defense +10.

Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)Lv. 1:Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.Lv. 2:Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.Lv. 3:Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Grants protection against defense down.Lv. 1:Reduces the duration of defense down by 50%.Lv. 2:Reduces the duration of defense down by 75%.Lv. 3:Prevents defense down.
Extends the duration of some item effects.Lv. 1:Item effect duration +10%.Lv. 2:Item effect duration +25%.Lv. 3:Item effect duration +50%.
Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.Lv. 1:Negates knockback during jumps.

Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.Lv. 1:While active, affinity +10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.Lv. 2:While active, affinity +20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.Lv. 3:While active, affinity +30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.Lv. 4:While active, affinity +40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.Lv. 5:While active, affinity +50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters and extends the dive-evade distance.Lv. 1:Enables skill use.

Slows down stamina depletion for actions that continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).Lv. 1:Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.Lv. 2:Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.Lv. 3:Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.
Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.Lv. 1:Affinity +10% while activeLv. 2:Affinity +20% while activeLv. 3:Affinity +30% while active

Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.Lv. 1:Lets you digets blue mushrooms and toadstools.Lv. 2:Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.Lv. 3:Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.
Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.Lv. 1:Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

Powers up Palicoes.Lv. 1:Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.Lv. 2:Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.Lv. 3:Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.Lv. 4:Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.Lv. 5:Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis.Lv. 1:Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.Lv. 2:Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.Lv. 3:Prevents paralysis.

Makes it easier to break large monster parts, and increases damage dealt when destroying a wound with a Focus Strike.Lv. 1:Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 10%.Lv. 2:Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 20%.Lv. 3:Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 30%.
Increases attack when your health is full.Lv. 1:Attack +3 while active.Lv. 2:Attack +6 while active.Lv. 3:Attack +10 while active.Lv. 4:Attack +15 while active.Lv. 5:Attack +20 while active.
Reduces damage while poisoned.Lv. 1:Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.Lv. 2:Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.Lv. 3:Prevents poison.
Speeds up weapon sheathing.Lv. 1:Slightly increases sheathing speed.Lv. 2:Increases sheathing speed.Lv. 3:Greatly increases sheathing speed.

Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).Lv. 1:Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.Lv. 2:Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.Lv. 3:Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.Lv. 1:Slightly increases recovery.Lv. 2:Moderately increases recovery.Lv. 3:Greatly increases recovery.

Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your Health Gauge).Lv. 1:Attack +5 while active.Lv. 2:Attack +10 while active.Lv. 3:Attack +15 while active.Lv. 4:Attack +20 while active.Lv. 5:Attack +25 while active.
Increases the attack power of Akuma actions and stun damage.Lv. 1:Activates the skill effect.
Attack and defense increase as time passes while on a quest. (The maximum is reached after 30 minutes.)Lv. 1:Activates skill effect.
Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you.Lv. 1:Activates skill effect.
Reduces the duration of sleep.Lv. 1:Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.Lv. 2:Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.Lv. 3:Prevents sleep.
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.Lv. 1:Moderately increases eating speed.Lv. 2:Increases eating speed.Lv. 3:Greatly increases eating speed.
Speeds up stamina recovery.Lv. 1:Stamina recovery speed +10%.Lv. 2:Stamina recovery speed +30%.Lv. 3:Stamina recovery speed +50%.
Grants protection against stench.Lv. 1:Reduces stench duration by 50%.Lv. 2:Prevents stench.
Reduces stun duration.Lv. 1:Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.Lv. 2:Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.Lv. 3:Prevents stun.
Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables.Lv. 1:Restores 50 health.Lv. 2:Restores 80 health.Lv. 3:Restores 100 health.
Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.Lv. 1:Thunder resistance +6Lv. 2:Thunder resistance +12Lv. 3:Thunder resistance +20, Defense +10

Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.Lv. 1:Shortens recharge time by 10%.Lv. 2:Shortens recharge time by 20%.Lv. 3:Shortens recharge time by 30%.Lv. 4:Shortens recharge time by 40%.Lv. 5:Shortens recharge time by 50%.

Grants protection against ground tremors.Lv. 1:Nullifies very minor ground tremors and halves effects of minor ground tremors.Lv. 2:Nullifies up to minor ground tremors and greatly reduces the effects of major grounded tremors.Lv. 3:Nullifies all ground tremors.
Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.Lv. 1:Water resistance +6.Lv. 2:Water resistance + 12.Lv. 3:Water resistance + 20. Defense +10.

Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster's weak points and wounds.Lv. 1:Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +5%, with an extra 3% on wounds.Lv. 2:Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +10%, with an extra 5% on wounds.Lv. 3:Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +15%, with an extra 10% on wounds.Lv. 4:Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +20%, with an extra 15% on wounds.Lv. 5:Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +30%, with an extra 20% on wounds.

Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.Lv. 1:Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.Lv. 2:Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.Lv. 3:Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.Lv. 4:Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.Lv. 5:Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

Grants protection against wind pressure.Lv. 1:Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effect of major wind pressure.Lv. 2:Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effect of dragon wind pressure.Lv. 3:Negates all kinds of wind pressure.
